name: Song of Morus: Heartbeat on Beat
name_original: Song of Morus: Heartbeat on Beat
description:
This is an experimental game about mixing shoot'em up with rhythm element. 

Work in Progress

CONTROL

WASD/ZQSD - Move
Spacebar - Float
Left Click - shoot fulu
Right Click - shoot coin
Esc - pause

Unlike most shooting game, you have to click ar right timing to make a shoot. And you can maxize your output by clicking both mouse button.

STORY

Taoist Priestess Song received a report about an upcoming Jiangshi crisis(Chinese hopping vampire), and decided to neutralize them all in one night. It's tricky decision because the cosmic energy during midnight is in the Jiangshi side, but Song finds a trick.
